MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA2 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Bowness Avenue, Statham Avenue, Kendal Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.28AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.31PM on 22nd January 2021.
